feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale southwesterly gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Watch extended southwards to Te Awamutu.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Westerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected above 600 metres until early Sunday morning, and 2 to 3 cm may accumulate about higher parts of the road. Another period of snow is possible Sunday evening, and 1 to 2 cm may accumulate above 700 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is possible above 800 metres on Sunday, and 1 to 3 cm may accumulate on the road.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow for a time above 600 metres Saturday night and Sunday morning, and 2 to 5 cm may accumulate on higher parts of the road. Another period of snow is possible Sunday evening, and 1 cm may accumulate above 700 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to affect the road above 700 metres Saturday night and early Sunday morning, and an additional 2 to 4 cm may accumulate. Another period of snow is expected from late Sunday afternoon until Monday afternoon, and an additional 10 to 20 cm of snow may accumulate on higher parts of the road, with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is possible above 700 metres on Sunday, and 1 to 4 cm may accumulate on the road.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
